name: U.F.OH NO (Updated)
description:
Please play in Fullscreen on a 1920x1080 monitor.

Escape the aliens and save your friends!  How high of a score can you get?

Basic Controls:

WASD - Movement

R - Reload

Left Click - Shoot/Melee

POST JAM UPDATES:

  • Guns are now 2x as likely to spawn from an enemy.
  • Melee attacks will now kill a basic alien in 3 hits instead of 6.
  • SMG now kills in 5 hits instead of 6.
  • Ending the game and going back to the menu will now properly reset the UI.
  • More triggers to increase score.
  • End game screen now displays final score.
  • Cannot win until Final Boss is dead.  The alien swarm is now slightly slower and stops a little earlier on the final level as well, to give you more room and time to fight.  

Message from the Dev:

Hello,

Thank you for playing my first game, I hope you enjoy.

This was a lot of fun to make, all art assets are of course from Kenney's pack, I combined sprites and for the most part only used the included colors.  The rules were a bit ambiguous with some details of what changes you can make to the art so I just did what I felt was right and within the intended rule set in those cases.

More levels coming soon for sure, I ran out of time after implementing so many mechanics.

Special thanks to T and V.
